artist: Artist: Robert Mallet-Stevens; Publisher: Mourlot Freres, Paris
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: small nearly square building with two yellow doors and yellow trim around top; above left door "TEL/EPH/ONE"; above right door "JOU/RN/AUX"; ticket (?) window right side; water fountain at left; at top of building "ARRETTRAM"
portfolio: From Une Cite Moderne, Dessins de Rob Mallet-Stevens Architecte, Pub.  Murlot, Paris 1987
signed: in plate UL corner, in black: [R. M-S.]; below image in margin, in black: [ARRET DES TRAMWAYS] ( mat slightly obscures title)
title: Arrét des tramways, from "Une Cite Moderne, Dessins de Rob Mallet-Stevens Architecte"
